General.Name: PG Electroplast Limited
General.Description: PG Electroplast Limited provides electronic manufacturing and plastic injection molding services for original equipment and design manufacturers in India and internationally. It offers parts of air-conditioners, air coolers, washing machines, refrigerators, ceiling fan parts, automobile parts, sanitary ware products, etc.; printed circuit board assemblies for LED TVs, set top boxes, energy meters, etc.; assembly and manufacturing of set top boxes, washing machines, air conditioners, air-coolers and LED TVs, etc.; and plastic molded components, painted and unpainted sheet metal components, AC components, fans, heat exchangers, and dies and tools, as well as powder coatings and copper connecting pipes. The company also provides small, medium, large sized, high-precision, and surface critical injection molded components; polymers for various hollow plastic products; moldings of thermoset polymers; small and medium sized moulds for applications in the automotive, white goods, home and kitchen appliances, lighting, and electrical equipment industries; and UF toilet seats. In addition, it owns and operates polyurethane paint shop. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Greater Noida, India.
